chronos and kairos

video installation, 2x projectors, hd, 6:51 minutes loop, sound, 2011

this video installation shows two identical scenes projected on opposite sides of a room, a white wall with a door on one side. in the first projection a character is trying to open the door with different keys, in the opposite projection there is no one at the door. during the film a new character arrives to the first wall, draws a circle in the center of the room and moves to the second projection to repeat the action, meanwhile in the first projection a third character arrives, erases the circle and moves to the second projection to repeat the action... the story creates an infinite loop.

leandro estrella
